Line13.7FA05: So...I turned to the Cathedral. Eldhaime itself is a giant capstone blessed with Inarius' Light. It subdued the evil below. It...it...
Line3.7FA05: I...I had to. Even after I warded the stone with Nafain and Airidah, the demon's power gradually seeped out.
MenuLabel: “Why did you build Eldhaime over such a dangerous thing?”
